title: ATAC-seq alignment quality metric
description: Schema for reporting ATAC-seq alignment quality metrics

processing_stage.title: Processing stage
processing_stage.description: The stage of post-mapping processing to which the statistics apply

total_reads.title: Number of total reads passing QC

total_reads_qc_failed.title: Number of total reads failing QC

duplicate_reads.title: Number of reads with duplicates passing QC

duplicate_reads_qc_failed.title: Number of reads with duplicates failing QC

mapped_reads.title: Number of mapped reads passing QC

mapped_reads_qc_failed.title: Number of mapped reads failing QC

pct_mapped_reads.title: Percentage of mapped reads passing QC

paired_reads.title: Number of paired reads passing QC

paired_reads_qc_failed.title: Number of paired reads failing QC

read1.title: Number of read1 reads passing QC

read1_qc_failed.title: Number of read1 reads failing QC

read2.title: Number of read2 reads passing QC

read2_qc_failed.title: Number of read2 reads failing QC

properly_paired_reads.title: Number of properly paired reads passing QC

properly_paired_reads_qc_failed.title: Number of properly paired reads failing QC

pct_properly_paired_reads.title: Percentage of properly paired reads passing QC

with_itself.title: Number of reads with itself & mate mapped passing QC

with_itself_qc_failed.title: Number of reads with itself & mate mapped failing QC

diff_chroms.title: Number of reads with mate mapped to different chromosomes passing QC

diff_chroms_qc_failed.title: Number of reads with mate mapped to different chromosomes failing QC

frac_reads_in_nfr.title: Fraction of NFR reads
frac_reads_in_nfr.description: Fraction of reads in nucleosome free region (NFR)

frac_reads_in_nfr_qc_pass.title: Pass quality check on fraction of NFR reads?

frac_reads_in_nfr_qc_reason.title: Quality check result on fraction of NFR reads

nfr_over_mono_nuc_reads.title: Ratio of NFR reads to Mono-Nuc reads
nfr_over_mono_nuc_reads.description: Ratio of reads in nucleosome free region (NFR) to reads in mononucleosome region (Mono-Nuc).

nfr_over_mono_nuc_reads_qc_pass.title: Pass quality check on ratio of NFR reads to Mono-Nuc reads?

nfr_over_mono_nuc_reads_qc_reason.title: Quality check result on ratio of NFR reads to Mono-Nuc reads

di_nuc_peak_exists.title: Presence of Di-Nuc peak
di_nuc_peak_exists.description: Whether there are peaks in dinucleosome regions (Di-Nuc).
